                                   int version)

      • encodeToBytes

        public byte[] encodeToBytes(byte[] input)
        Encodes the given bytes in base58. No checksum is appended.

      • decode

        public byte[] decode(java.lang.String input)
              throws EncodingFormatException
        抛出:
        EncodingFormatException

      • decodeChecked

        public byte[] decodeChecked(java.lang.String input,
                            int version)
                     throws EncodingFormatException
        Uses the checksum in the last 4 bytes of the decoded data to verify the rest are correct. The checksum is removed from the returned data.
        抛出:
        EncodingFormatException - if the input is not baseFields 58 or the checksum does not validate.
